title: New course on training dialogos w/ Taylor Barrett - Voices with Vervaeke
description: Taylor has been on the channel before. Here we discuss his new course, in which I will guest lecture/facilitate,  that trains people in dialogos. We discuss the nature and structure of the course as well as its personal and cultural significance.  Here is the link to the course website: http://circling.ca/dialogos.html
